# 7. Antagonism
Even bad guys follow their own rules.
## Antagonist Roles
- When taking a ghost role, follow its set of rules unless told otherwise by an admin. -- Spamming ahelp asking for an exception will likely lead to a ban. -- Solo antags (e.g. space dragon) and free agents should not work with team antagonists (e.g. pirates). - Non-antagonists must not work with antagonists and vice-versa. - Antagonist roles are expected to act hostile towards non-antagonists. -- Antagonists include xenomorphs, nuclear operatives, space dragons, zombies and pirates. - Free agents may act hostile towards non-antonists or not, at their discretion.
